Text:
X-Man god bless you.
I appreciate all the wonderful torrents you've provided, but I don't know if you appreciate how rare and wonderful this one is.
"Full Body Massage" is almost impossible to find. It is not available on any video store shelves and can not not even be found on sale sites such as Amazon or Movies Unlimited. I think it has been pulled from distribution.
The fact that Mimi Rogers (an A-list actress) gets royally felt up in a mainstream Hollywood film is something that just doesn't get done anymore.
We need to keep this torrent alive so that other collectors (such as myself) can finally get a copy of this rarity. You should rename this torrent so that folks don't merely stumble across it.
HEY YOU GUYS - Mimi Rogers is stark naked over here - and X-Man has got her!
Thanks a million.
i thought this was an instructional video for learning how to massage. Its actually a movie that has a few massage scenes.

hi, can u help me by telling as to which software do i use to download this, as flash get is not doing it and i want to use downloadaccelerator.

thanks.
Thanks a lot x-man, this is a real treasure. Nic Roeg's lost movie is alive and well!
